name: One Last Time (Tudypie)
description:
One last time is a short psychological horror game where you discover the true meaning of Josh's nightmares.

Game Info

Adventure out in a dream world and explore tenebrous environments. Discover the hidden truth behind the nightmares in this first-person horror adventure game.  Experience the horror atmosphere and ambiance which convey the effect of presence and plunge into madness. Gameplay time is around 10 minutes.

Controls WASDMoveShiftRunMouse
LookEInteract Credits

Tools used

Unity - Game Engine

Blender - 3D modeling

Krita - 2D images

Programming, Level Design, and Project made by Tudypie

Sound effect + Music

Sound effects from zapsplat.com and quicksounds.com

Intro music: Broken Piano | Horror Music by VIVEK ABHISHEK

Main menu music: F1 - Gradations of arms-length by The Caretaker

Voice acting by Morgan

Asset Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution

"Old Rusty Car"  and "Old Rusty Car 2" by Renafox; "Ceiling Light 2"  by rhcreations; "Billboard" by Minzkraut;  "Red rose"  by Lassi Kaukonen;  "Wood Stick 05"  by 3dhdscan;  "Human Skull" by Sergey Egelsky; "Stone Pillar"  by jayanam; "Black Demon" by simonemaccari; "Emergency Stop Button"  by Miljan Bojovic; "Building Hallway" by jimbogies; "Stylized Wood Signs"  by Fis9000; "Folded Wrinkled Paper" by pozo3d.

Additional Info

I hope you enjoy playing my game and please leave a comment providing feedback 

The game will be updated in the near future after receiving feedback so don't forget to leave a comment!

IMPORTANT If you are playing the game on a wide monitor or on a 4:3 monitor the UI will not appear correctly! I am sorry for that!

You can also follow me on Twitter to see updates and new releases: @tudypie1
